00056 CUDTSocket::CUDTSocket():
00057 m_Status(INIT),
00058 m_TimeStamp(0),
00059 m_iIPversion(0),
00060 m_pSelfAddr(NULL),
00061 m_pPeerAddr(NULL),
00062 m_SocketID(0),
00063 m_ListenSocket(0),
00064 m_PeerID(0),
00065 m_iISN(0),
00066 m_pUDT(NULL),
00067 m_pQueuedSockets(NULL),
00068 m_pAcceptSockets(NULL),
00069 m_AcceptCond(),
00070 m_AcceptLock(),
00071 m_uiBackLog(0),
00072 m_iMuxID(-1)
00073 {
00074    #ifndef WIN32
00075       pthread_mutex_init(&m_AcceptLock, NULL);
00076       pthread_cond_init(&m_AcceptCond, NULL);
00077    #else
00078       m_AcceptLock = CreateMutex(NULL, false, NULL);
00079       m_AcceptCond = CreateEvent(NULL, false, false, NULL);
00080    #endif
00081 }
00082 
00083 CUDTSocket::~CUDTSocket()
00084 {
00085    if (AF_INET == m_iIPversion)
00086    {
00087       delete (sockaddr_in*)m_pSelfAddr;
00088       delete (sockaddr_in*)m_pPeerAddr;
00089    }
00090    else
00091    {
00092       delete (sockaddr_in6*)m_pSelfAddr;
00093       delete (sockaddr_in6*)m_pPeerAddr;
00094    }
00095 
00096    delete m_pUDT;
00097    m_pUDT = NULL;
00098 
00099    delete m_pQueuedSockets;
00100    delete m_pAcceptSockets;
00101 
00102    #ifndef WIN32
00103       pthread_mutex_destroy(&m_AcceptLock);
00104       pthread_cond_destroy(&m_AcceptCond);
00105    #else
00106       CloseHandle(m_AcceptLock);
00107       CloseHandle(m_AcceptCond);
00108    #endif
00109 }

00113 CUDTUnited::CUDTUnited():
00114 m_Sockets(),
00115 m_ControlLock(),
00116 m_IDLock(),
00117 m_SocketID(0),
00118 m_TLSError(),
00119 m_mMultiplexer(),
00120 m_MultiplexerLock(),
00121 m_pCache(NULL),
00122 m_bClosing(false),
00123 m_GCStopLock(),
00124 m_GCStopCond(),
00125 m_InitLock(),
00126 m_iInstanceCount(0),
00127 m_bGCStatus(false),
00128 m_GCThread(),
00129 m_ClosedSockets()
00130 {
00131    // Socket ID MUST start from a random value
00132    srand((unsigned int)CTimer::getTime());
00133    m_SocketID = 1 + (int)((1 << 30) * (double(rand()) / RAND_MAX));
00134 
00135    #ifndef WIN32
00136       pthread_mutex_init(&m_ControlLock, NULL);
00137       pthread_mutex_init(&m_IDLock, NULL);
00138       pthread_mutex_init(&m_InitLock, NULL);
00139    #else
00140       m_ControlLock = CreateMutex(NULL, false, NULL);
00141       m_IDLock = CreateMutex(NULL, false, NULL);
00142       m_InitLock = CreateMutex(NULL, false, NULL);
00143    #endif
00144 
00145    #ifndef WIN32
00146       pthread_key_create(&m_TLSError, TLSDestroy);
00147    #else
00148       m_TLSError = TlsAlloc();
00149       m_TLSLock = CreateMutex(NULL, false, NULL);
00150    #endif
00151 
00152    m_pCache = new CCache;
00153 }

00155 CUDTUnited::~CUDTUnited()
00156 {
00157    #ifndef WIN32
00158       pthread_mutex_destroy(&m_ControlLock);
00159       pthread_mutex_destroy(&m_IDLock);
00160       pthread_mutex_destroy(&m_InitLock);
00161    #else
00162       CloseHandle(m_ControlLock);
00163       CloseHandle(m_IDLock);
00164       CloseHandle(m_InitLock);
00165    #endif
00166 
00167    #ifndef WIN32
00168       pthread_key_delete(m_TLSError);
00169    #else
00170       TlsFree(m_TLSError);
00171       CloseHandle(m_TLSLock);
00172    #endif
00173 
00174    delete m_pCache;
00175 }

00177 int CUDTUnited::startup()
00178 {
00179    CGuard gcinit(m_InitLock);
00180 
00181    if (m_iInstanceCount++ > 0)
00182       return 0;
00183 
00184    // Global initialization code
00185    #ifdef WIN32
00186       WORD wVersionRequested;
00187       WSADATA wsaData;
00188       wVersionRequested = MAKEWORD(2, 2);
00189 
00190       if (0 != WSAStartup(wVersionRequested, &wsaData))
00191          throw CUDTException(1, 0,  WSAGetLastError());
00192    #endif
00193 
00194    //init CTimer::EventLock
00195 
00196    if (m_bGCStatus)
00197       return true;
00198 
00199    m_bClosing = false;
00200    #ifndef WIN32
00201       pthread_mutex_init(&m_GCStopLock, NULL);
00202       pthread_cond_init(&m_GCStopCond, NULL);
00203       pthread_create(&m_GCThread, NULL, garbageCollect, this);
00204    #else
00205       m_GCStopLock = CreateMutex(NULL, false, NULL);
00206       m_GCStopCond = CreateEvent(NULL, false, false, NULL);
00207       DWORD ThreadID;
00208       m_GCThread = CreateThread(NULL, 0, garbageCollect, this, 0, &ThreadID);
00209    #endif
00210 
00211    m_bGCStatus = true;
00212 
00213    return 0;
00214 }
00215 
00216 int CUDTUnited::cleanup()
00217 {
00218    CGuard gcinit(m_InitLock);
00219 
00220    if (--m_iInstanceCount > 0)
00221       return 0;
00222 
00223    //destroy CTimer::EventLock
00224 
00225    if (!m_bGCStatus)
00226       return 0;
00227 
00228    m_bClosing = true;
00229    #ifndef WIN32
00230       pthread_cond_signal(&m_GCStopCond);
00231       pthread_join(m_GCThread, NULL);
00232       pthread_mutex_destroy(&m_GCStopLock);
00233       pthread_cond_destroy(&m_GCStopCond);
00234    #else
00235       SetEvent(m_GCStopCond);
00236       WaitForSingleObject(m_GCThread, INFINITE);
00237       CloseHandle(m_GCThread);
00238       CloseHandle(m_GCStopLock);
00239       CloseHandle(m_GCStopCond);
00240    #endif
00241 
00242    m_bGCStatus = false;
00243 
00244    // Global destruction code
00245    #ifdef WIN32
00246       WSACleanup();
00247    #endif
00248 
00249    return 0;
00250 }
00251 
00252 UDTSOCKET CUDTUnited::newSocket(const int& af, const int& type)
00253 {
00254    if ((type != SOCK_STREAM) && (type != SOCK_DGRAM))
00255       throw CUDTException(5, 3, 0);
00256 
00257    CUDTSocket* ns = NULL;
00258 
00259    try
00260    {
00261       ns = new CUDTSocket;
00262       ns->m_pUDT = new CUDT;
00263       if (AF_INET == af)
00264       {
00265          ns->m_pSelfAddr = (sockaddr*)(new sockaddr_in);
00266          ((sockaddr_in*)(ns->m_pSelfAddr))->sin_port = 0;
00267       }
00268       else
00269       {
00270          ns->m_pSelfAddr = (sockaddr*)(new sockaddr_in6);
00271          ((sockaddr_in6*)(ns->m_pSelfAddr))->sin6_port = 0;
00272       }
00273    }
00274    catch (...)
00275    {
00276       delete ns;
00277       throw CUDTException(3, 2, 0);
00278    }
00279 
00280    CGuard::enterCS(m_IDLock);
00281    ns->m_SocketID = -- m_SocketID;
00282    CGuard::leaveCS(m_IDLock);
00283 
00284    ns->m_Status = INIT;
00285    ns->m_ListenSocket = 0;
00286    ns->m_pUDT->m_SocketID = ns->m_SocketID;
00287    ns->m_pUDT->m_iSockType = (SOCK_STREAM == type) ? UDT_STREAM : UDT_DGRAM;
00288    ns->m_pUDT->m_iIPversion = ns->m_iIPversion = af;
00289    ns->m_pUDT->m_pCache = m_pCache;
00290 
00291    // protect the m_Sockets structure.
00292    CGuard::enterCS(m_ControlLock);
00293    try
00294    {
00295       m_Sockets[ns->m_SocketID] = ns;
00296    }
00297    catch (...)
00298    {
00299       //failure and rollback
00300       delete ns;
00301       ns = NULL;
00302    }
00303    CGuard::leaveCS(m_ControlLock);
00304 
00305    if (NULL == ns)
00306       throw CUDTException(3, 2, 0);
00307 
00308    return ns->m_SocketID;
00309 }
00310 
00311 int CUDTUnited::newConnection(const UDTSOCKET listen, const sockaddr* peer, CHandShake* hs)
00312 {
00313    CUDTSocket* ns = NULL;
00314    CUDTSocket* ls = locate(listen);
00315 
00316    if (NULL == ls)
00317       return -1;
00318 
00319    // if this connection has already been processed
00320    if (NULL != (ns = locate(peer, hs->m_iID, hs->m_iISN)))
00321    {
00322       if (ns->m_pUDT->m_bBroken)
00323       {
00324          // last connection from the "peer" address has been broken
00325          ns->m_Status = CLOSED;
00326          ns->m_TimeStamp = CTimer::getTime();
00327 
00328          CGuard::enterCS(ls->m_AcceptLock);
00329          ls->m_pQueuedSockets->erase(ns->m_SocketID);
00330          ls->m_pAcceptSockets->erase(ns->m_SocketID);
00331          CGuard::leaveCS(ls->m_AcceptLock);
00332       }
00333       else
00334       {
00335          // connection already exist, this is a repeated connection request
00336          // respond with existing HS information
00337 
00338          hs->m_iISN = ns->m_pUDT->m_iISN;
00339          hs->m_iMSS = ns->m_pUDT->m_iMSS;
00340          hs->m_iFlightFlagSize = ns->m_pUDT->m_iFlightFlagSize;
00341          hs->m_iReqType = -1;
00342          hs->m_iID = ns->m_SocketID;
00343 
00344          return 0;
00345 
00346          //except for this situation a new connection should be started
00347       }
00348    }
00349 
00350    // exceeding backlog, refuse the connection request
00351    if (ls->m_pQueuedSockets->size() >= ls->m_uiBackLog)
00352       return -1;
00353 
00354    try
00355    {
00356       ns = new CUDTSocket;
00357       ns->m_pUDT = new CUDT(*(ls->m_pUDT));
00358       if (AF_INET == ls->m_iIPversion)
00359       {
00360          ns->m_pSelfAddr = (sockaddr*)(new sockaddr_in);
00361          ((sockaddr_in*)(ns->m_pSelfAddr))->sin_port = 0;
00362          ns->m_pPeerAddr = (sockaddr*)(new sockaddr_in);
00363          memcpy(ns->m_pPeerAddr, peer, sizeof(sockaddr_in));
00364       }
00365       else
00366       {
00367          ns->m_pSelfAddr = (sockaddr*)(new sockaddr_in6);
00368          ((sockaddr_in6*)(ns->m_pSelfAddr))->sin6_port = 0;
00369          ns->m_pPeerAddr = (sockaddr*)(new sockaddr_in6);
00370          memcpy(ns->m_pPeerAddr, peer, sizeof(sockaddr_in6));
00371       }
00372    }
00373    catch (...)
00374    {
00375       delete ns;
00376       return -1;
00377    }
00378 
00379    CGuard::enterCS(m_IDLock);
00380    ns->m_SocketID = -- m_SocketID;
00381    CGuard::leaveCS(m_IDLock);
00382 
00383    ns->m_ListenSocket = listen;
00384    ns->m_iIPversion = ls->m_iIPversion;
00385    ns->m_pUDT->m_SocketID = ns->m_SocketID;
00386    ns->m_PeerID = hs->m_iID;
00387    ns->m_iISN = hs->m_iISN;
00388 
00389    int error = 0;
00390 
00391    try
00392    {
00393       // bind to the same addr of listening socket
00394       ns->m_pUDT->open();
00395       updateMux(ns, ls);
00396       ns->m_pUDT->connect(peer, hs);
00397    }
00398    catch (...)
00399    {
00400       error = 1;
00401       goto ERR_ROLLBACK;
00402    }
00403 
00404    ns->m_Status = CONNECTED;
00405 
00406    // copy address information of local node
00407    ns->m_pUDT->m_pSndQueue->m_pChannel->getSockAddr(ns->m_pSelfAddr);
00408    CIPAddress::pton(ns->m_pSelfAddr, ns->m_pUDT->m_piSelfIP, ns->m_iIPversion);
00409 
00410    // protect the m_Sockets structure.
00411    CGuard::enterCS(m_ControlLock);
00412    try
00413    {
00414       m_Sockets[ns->m_SocketID] = ns;
00415       m_PeerRec[(ns->m_PeerID << 30) + ns->m_iISN].insert(ns->m_SocketID);
00416    }
00417    catch (...)
00418    {
00419       error = 2;
00420    }
00421    CGuard::leaveCS(m_ControlLock);
00422 
00423    CGuard::enterCS(ls->m_AcceptLock);
00424    try
00425    {
00426       ls->m_pQueuedSockets->insert(ns->m_SocketID);
00427    }
00428    catch (...)
00429    {
00430       error = 3;
00431    }
00432    CGuard::leaveCS(ls->m_AcceptLock);
00433 
00434    CTimer::triggerEvent();
00435 
00436    ERR_ROLLBACK:
00437    if (error > 0)
00438    {
00439       ns->m_pUDT->close();
00440       ns->m_Status = CLOSED;
00441       ns->m_TimeStamp = CTimer::getTime();
00442 
00443       return -1;
00444    }
00445 
00446    // wake up a waiting accept() call
00447    #ifndef WIN32
00448       pthread_mutex_lock(&(ls->m_AcceptLock));
00449       pthread_cond_signal(&(ls->m_AcceptCond));
00450       pthread_mutex_unlock(&(ls->m_AcceptLock));
00451    #else
00452       SetEvent(ls->m_AcceptCond);
00453    #endif
00454 
00455    return 1;
00456 }
00457 
00458 CUDT* CUDTUnited::lookup(const UDTSOCKET u)
00459 {
00460    // protects the m_Sockets structure
00461    CGuard cg(m_ControlLock);
00462 
00463    map<UDTSOCKET, CUDTSocket*>::iterator i = m_Sockets.find(u);
00464 
00465    if ((i == m_Sockets.end()) || (i->second->m_Status == CLOSED))
00466       throw CUDTException(5, 4, 0);
00467 
00468    return i->second->m_pUDT;
00469 }
00470 
00471 UDTSTATUS CUDTUnited::getStatus(const UDTSOCKET u)
00472 {
00473    // protects the m_Sockets structure
00474    CGuard cg(m_ControlLock);
00475 
00476    map<UDTSOCKET, CUDTSocket*>::iterator i = m_Sockets.find(u);
00477 
00478    if (i == m_Sockets.end())
00479    {
00480       if (m_ClosedSockets.find(u) != m_ClosedSockets.end())
00481          return CLOSED;
00482 
00483       return NONEXIST;
00484    }
00485 
00486    if (i->second->m_pUDT->m_bBroken)
00487       return BROKEN;
00488 
00489    return i->second->m_Status;   
00490 }
00491 
00492 int CUDTUnited::bind(const UDTSOCKET u, const sockaddr* name, const int& namelen)
00493 {
00494    CUDTSocket* s = locate(u);
00495 
00496    if (NULL == s)
00497       throw CUDTException(5, 4, 0);
00498 
00499    // cannot bind a socket more than once
00500    if (INIT != s->m_Status)
00501       throw CUDTException(5, 0, 0);
00502 
00503    // check the size of SOCKADDR structure
00504    if (AF_INET == s->m_iIPversion)
00505    {
00506       if (namelen != sizeof(sockaddr_in))
00507          throw CUDTException(5, 3, 0);
00508    }
00509    else
00510    {
00511       if (namelen != sizeof(sockaddr_in6))
00512          throw CUDTException(5, 3, 0);
00513    }
00514 
00515    s->m_pUDT->open();
00516    updateMux(s, name);
00517    s->m_Status = OPENED;
00518 
00519    // copy address information of local node
00520    s->m_pUDT->m_pSndQueue->m_pChannel->getSockAddr(s->m_pSelfAddr);
00521 
00522    return 0;
00523 }
00524 
00525 int CUDTUnited::bind(UDTSOCKET u, UDPSOCKET udpsock)
00526 {
00527    CUDTSocket* s = locate(u);
00528 
00529    if (NULL == s)
00530       throw CUDTException(5, 4, 0);
00531 
00532    // cannot bind a socket more than once
00533    if (INIT != s->m_Status)
00534       throw CUDTException(5, 0, 0);
00535 
00536    sockaddr_in name4;
00537    sockaddr_in6 name6;
00538    sockaddr* name;
00539    socklen_t namelen;
00540 
00541    if (AF_INET == s->m_iIPversion)
00542    {
00543       namelen = sizeof(sockaddr_in);
00544       name = (sockaddr*)&name4;
00545    }
00546    else
00547    {
00548       namelen = sizeof(sockaddr_in6);
00549       name = (sockaddr*)&name6;
00550    }
00551 
00552    if (-1 == ::getsockname(udpsock, name, &namelen))
00553       throw CUDTException(5, 3);
00554 
00555    s->m_pUDT->open();
00556    updateMux(s, name, &udpsock);
00557    s->m_Status = OPENED;
00558 
00559    // copy address information of local node
00560    s->m_pUDT->m_pSndQueue->m_pChannel->getSockAddr(s->m_pSelfAddr);
00561 
00562    return 0;
00563 }
00564 
00565 int CUDTUnited::listen(const UDTSOCKET u, const int& backlog)
00566 {
00567    CUDTSocket* s = locate(u);
00568 
00569    if (NULL == s)
00570       throw CUDTException(5, 4, 0);
00571 
00572    // do nothing if the socket is already listening
00573    if (LISTENING == s->m_Status)
00574       return 0;
00575 
00576    // a socket can listen only if is in OPENED status
00577    if (OPENED != s->m_Status)
00578       throw CUDTException(5, 5, 0);
00579 
00580    // listen is not supported in rendezvous connection setup
00581    if (s->m_pUDT->m_bRendezvous)
00582       throw CUDTException(5, 7, 0);
00583 
00584    if (backlog <= 0)
00585       throw CUDTException(5, 3, 0);
00586 
00587    s->m_uiBackLog = backlog;
00588 
00589    try
00590    {
00591       s->m_pQueuedSockets = new set<UDTSOCKET>;
00592       s->m_pAcceptSockets = new set<UDTSOCKET>;
00593    }
00594    catch (...)
00595    {
00596       delete s->m_pQueuedSockets;
00597       throw CUDTException(3, 2, 0);
00598    }
00599 
00600    s->m_pUDT->listen();
00601 
00602    s->m_Status = LISTENING;
00603 
00604    return 0;
00605 }
00606 
00607 UDTSOCKET CUDTUnited::accept(const UDTSOCKET listen, sockaddr* addr, int* addrlen)
00608 {
00609    if ((NULL != addr) && (NULL == addrlen))
00610       throw CUDTException(5, 3, 0);
00611 
00612    CUDTSocket* ls = locate(listen);
00613 
00614    if (ls == NULL)
00615       throw CUDTException(5, 4, 0);
00616 
00617    // the "listen" socket must be in LISTENING status
00618    if (LISTENING != ls->m_Status)
00619       throw CUDTException(5, 6, 0);
00620 
00621    // no "accept" in rendezvous connection setup
00622    if (ls->m_pUDT->m_bRendezvous)
00623       throw CUDTException(5, 7, 0);
00624 
00625    UDTSOCKET u = CUDT::INVALID_SOCK;
00626    bool accepted = false;
00627 
00628    // !!only one conection can be set up each time!!
00629    #ifndef WIN32
00630       while (!accepted)
00631       {
00632          pthread_mutex_lock(&(ls->m_AcceptLock));
00633 
00634          if (ls->m_pQueuedSockets->size() > 0)
00635          {
00636             u = *(ls->m_pQueuedSockets->begin());
00637             ls->m_pAcceptSockets->insert(ls->m_pAcceptSockets->end(), u);
00638             ls->m_pQueuedSockets->erase(ls->m_pQueuedSockets->begin());
00639             accepted = true;
00640          }
00641          else if (!ls->m_pUDT->m_bSynRecving)
00642             accepted = true;
00643          else if (LISTENING == ls->m_Status)
00644             pthread_cond_wait(&(ls->m_AcceptCond), &(ls->m_AcceptLock));
00645 
00646          if ((LISTENING != ls->m_Status) || ls->m_pUDT->m_bBroken)
00647             accepted = true;
00648 
00649          if (ls->m_pQueuedSockets->empty())
00650             m_EPoll.disable_read(listen, ls->m_pUDT->m_sPollID);
00651 
00652          pthread_mutex_unlock(&(ls->m_AcceptLock));
00653       }
00654    #else
00655       while (!accepted)
00656       {
00657          WaitForSingleObject(ls->m_AcceptLock, INFINITE);
00658 
00659          if (ls->m_pQueuedSockets->size() > 0)
00660          {
00661             u = *(ls->m_pQueuedSockets->begin());
00662             ls->m_pAcceptSockets->insert(ls->m_pAcceptSockets->end(), u);
00663             ls->m_pQueuedSockets->erase(ls->m_pQueuedSockets->begin());
00664 
00665             accepted = true;
00666          }
00667          else if (!ls->m_pUDT->m_bSynRecving)
00668             accepted = true;
00669 
00670          ReleaseMutex(ls->m_AcceptLock);
00671 
00672          if  (!accepted & (LISTENING == ls->m_Status))
00673             WaitForSingleObject(ls->m_AcceptCond, INFINITE);
00674 
00675          if ((LISTENING != ls->m_Status) || ls->m_pUDT->m_bBroken)
00676          {
00677             SetEvent(ls->m_AcceptCond);
00678             accepted = true;
00679          }
00680 
00681          if (ls->m_pQueuedSockets->empty())
00682             m_EPoll.disable_read(listen, ls->m_pUDT->m_sPollID);
00683       }
00684    #endif
00685 
00686    if (u == CUDT::INVALID_SOCK)
00687    {
00688       // non-blocking receiving, no connection available
00689       if (!ls->m_pUDT->m_bSynRecving)
00690          throw CUDTException(6, 2, 0);
00691 
00692       // listening socket is closed
00693       throw CUDTException(5, 6, 0);
00694    }
00695 
00696    if ((addr != NULL) && (addrlen != NULL))
00697    {
00698       if (AF_INET == locate(u)->m_iIPversion)
00699          *addrlen = sizeof(sockaddr_in);
00700       else
00701          *addrlen = sizeof(sockaddr_in6);
00702 
00703       // copy address information of peer node
00704       memcpy(addr, locate(u)->m_pPeerAddr, *addrlen);
00705    }
00706 
00707    return u;
00708 }
00709 
00710 int CUDTUnited::connect(const UDTSOCKET u, const sockaddr* name, const int& namelen)
00711 {
00712    CUDTSocket* s = locate(u);
00713 
00714    if (NULL == s)
00715       throw CUDTException(5, 4, 0);
00716 
00717    // check the size of SOCKADDR structure
00718    if (AF_INET == s->m_iIPversion)
00719    {
00720       if (namelen != sizeof(sockaddr_in))
00721          throw CUDTException(5, 3, 0);
00722    }
00723    else
00724    {
00725       if (namelen != sizeof(sockaddr_in6))
00726          throw CUDTException(5, 3, 0);
00727    }
00728 
00729    // a socket can "connect" only if it is in INIT or OPENED status
00730    if (INIT == s->m_Status)
00731    {
00732       if (!s->m_pUDT->m_bRendezvous)
00733       {
00734          s->m_pUDT->open();
00735          updateMux(s);
00736          s->m_Status = OPENED;
00737       }
00738       else
00739          throw CUDTException(5, 8, 0);
00740    }
00741    else if (OPENED != s->m_Status)
00742       throw CUDTException(5, 2, 0);
00743 
00744    // copy address information of local node
00745    // the local port must be correctly assigned BEFORE CUDT::connect(),
00746    // otherwise if connect() fails, the multiplexer cannot be located by garbage collection and will cause leak
00747    s->m_pUDT->m_pSndQueue->m_pChannel->getSockAddr(s->m_pSelfAddr);
00748    CIPAddress::pton(s->m_pSelfAddr, s->m_pUDT->m_piSelfIP, s->m_iIPversion);
00749 
00750    s->m_pUDT->connect(name);
00751    s->m_Status = CONNECTED;
00752 
00753    // record peer address
00754    if (AF_INET == s->m_iIPversion)
00755    {
00756       s->m_pPeerAddr = (sockaddr*)(new sockaddr_in);
00757       memcpy(s->m_pPeerAddr, name, sizeof(sockaddr_in));
00758    }
00759    else
00760    {
00761       s->m_pPeerAddr = (sockaddr*)(new sockaddr_in6);
00762       memcpy(s->m_pPeerAddr, name, sizeof(sockaddr_in6));
00763    }
00764 
00765    return 0;
00766 }
00767 
00768 int CUDTUnited::close(const UDTSOCKET u)
00769 {
00770    CUDTSocket* s = locate(u);
00771 
00772    if (NULL == s)
00773       throw CUDTException(5, 4, 0);
00774 
00775    if (s->m_Status == LISTENING)
00776    {
00777       if (s->m_pUDT->m_bBroken)
00778          return 0;
00779 
00780       s->m_TimeStamp = CTimer::getTime();
00781       s->m_pUDT->m_bBroken = true;
00782 
00783       // broadcast all "accept" waiting
00784       #ifndef WIN32
00785          pthread_mutex_lock(&(s->m_AcceptLock));
00786          pthread_cond_broadcast(&(s->m_AcceptCond));
00787          pthread_mutex_unlock(&(s->m_AcceptLock));
00788       #else
00789          SetEvent(s->m_AcceptCond);
00790       #endif
00791 
00792       return 0;
00793    }
00794 
00795    s->m_pUDT->close();
00796 
00797    // synchronize with garbage collection.
00798    CGuard cg(m_ControlLock);
00799 
00800    // since "s" is located before m_ControlLock, locate it again in case it became invalid
00801    map<UDTSOCKET, CUDTSocket*>::iterator i = m_Sockets.find(u);
00802    if ((i == m_Sockets.end()) || (i->second->m_Status == CLOSED))
00803       return 0;
00804    s = i->second;
00805 
00806    s->m_Status = CLOSED;
00807 
00808    // a socket will not be immediated removed when it is closed
00809    // in order to prevent other methods from accessing invalid address
00810    // a timer is started and the socket will be removed after approximately 1 second
00811    s->m_TimeStamp = CTimer::getTime();
00812 
00813    m_Sockets.erase(s->m_SocketID);
00814    m_ClosedSockets.insert(pair<UDTSOCKET, CUDTSocket*>(s->m_SocketID, s));
00815 
00816    CTimer::triggerEvent();
00817 
00818    return 0;
00819 }
00820 
00821 int CUDTUnited::getpeername(const UDTSOCKET u, sockaddr* name, int* namelen)
00822 {
00823    if (CONNECTED != getStatus(u))
00824       throw CUDTException(2, 2, 0);
00825 
00826    CUDTSocket* s = locate(u);
00827 
00828    if (NULL == s)
00829       throw CUDTException(5, 4, 0);
00830 
00831    if (!s->m_pUDT->m_bConnected || s->m_pUDT->m_bBroken)
00832       throw CUDTException(2, 2, 0);
00833 
00834    if (AF_INET == s->m_iIPversion)
00835       *namelen = sizeof(sockaddr_in);
00836    else
00837       *namelen = sizeof(sockaddr_in6);
00838 
00839    // copy address information of peer node
00840    memcpy(name, s->m_pPeerAddr, *namelen);
00841 
00842    return 0;
00843 }
00844 
00845 int CUDTUnited::getsockname(const UDTSOCKET u, sockaddr* name, int* namelen)
00846 {
00847    CUDTSocket* s = locate(u);
00848 
00849    if (NULL == s)
00850       throw CUDTException(5, 4, 0);
00851 
00852    if (s->m_pUDT->m_bBroken)
00853       throw CUDTException(5, 4, 0);
00854 
00855    if (INIT == s->m_Status)
00856       throw CUDTException(2, 2, 0);
00857 
00858    if (AF_INET == s->m_iIPversion)
00859       *namelen = sizeof(sockaddr_in);
00860    else
00861       *namelen = sizeof(sockaddr_in6);
00862 
00863    // copy address information of local node
00864    memcpy(name, s->m_pSelfAddr, *namelen);
00865 
00866    return 0;
00867 }
00868 
00869 int CUDTUnited::select(ud_set* readfds, ud_set* writefds, ud_set* exceptfds, const timeval* timeout)
00870 {
00871    uint64_t entertime = CTimer::getTime();
00872 
00873    uint64_t to;
00874    if (NULL == timeout)
00875       to = 0xFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFULL;
00876    else
00877       to = timeout->tv_sec * 1000000 + timeout->tv_usec;
00878 
00879    // initialize results
00880    int count = 0;
00881    set<UDTSOCKET> rs, ws, es;
00882 
00883    // retrieve related UDT sockets
00884    vector<CUDTSocket*> ru, wu, eu;
00885    CUDTSocket* s;
00886    if (NULL != readfds)
00887       for (set<UDTSOCKET>::iterator i1 = readfds->begin(); i1 != readfds->end(); ++ i1)
00888       {
00889          if (BROKEN == getStatus(*i1))
00890          {
00891             rs.insert(*i1);
00892             ++ count;
00893          }
00894          else if (NULL == (s = locate(*i1)))
00895             throw CUDTException(5, 4, 0);
00896          else
00897             ru.insert(ru.end(), s);
00898       }
00899    if (NULL != writefds)
00900       for (set<UDTSOCKET>::iterator i2 = writefds->begin(); i2 != writefds->end(); ++ i2)
00901       {
00902          if (BROKEN == getStatus(*i2))
00903          {
00904             ws.insert(*i2);
00905             ++ count;
00906          }
00907          else if (NULL == (s = locate(*i2)))
00908             throw CUDTException(5, 4, 0);
00909          else
00910             wu.insert(wu.end(), s);
00911       }
00912    if (NULL != exceptfds)
00913       for (set<UDTSOCKET>::iterator i3 = exceptfds->begin(); i3 != exceptfds->end(); ++ i3)
00914       {
00915          if (BROKEN == getStatus(*i3))
00916          {
00917             es.insert(*i3);
00918             ++ count;
00919          }
00920          else if (NULL == (s = locate(*i3)))
00921             throw CUDTException(5, 4, 0);
00922          else
00923             eu.insert(eu.end(), s);
00924       }
00925 
00926    do
00927    {
00928       // query read sockets
00929       for (vector<CUDTSocket*>::iterator j1 = ru.begin(); j1 != ru.end(); ++ j1)
00930       {
00931          s = *j1;
00932 
00933          if ((s->m_pUDT->m_bConnected && (s->m_pUDT->m_pRcvBuffer->getRcvDataSize() > 0) && ((s->m_pUDT->m_iSockType == UDT_STREAM) || (s->m_pUDT->m_pRcvBuffer->getRcvMsgNum() > 0)))
00934             || (!s->m_pUDT->m_bListening && (s->m_pUDT->m_bBroken || !s->m_pUDT->m_bConnected))
00935             || (s->m_pUDT->m_bListening && (s->m_pQueuedSockets->size() > 0))
00936             || (s->m_Status == CLOSED))
00937          {
00938             rs.insert(s->m_SocketID);
00939             ++ count;
00940          }
00941       }
00942 
00943       // query write sockets
00944       for (vector<CUDTSocket*>::iterator j2 = wu.begin(); j2 != wu.end(); ++ j2)
00945       {
00946          s = *j2;
00947 
00948          if ((s->m_pUDT->m_bConnected && (s->m_pUDT->m_pSndBuffer->getCurrBufSize() < s->m_pUDT->m_iSndBufSize))
00949             || s->m_pUDT->m_bBroken || !s->m_pUDT->m_bConnected || (s->m_Status == CLOSED))
00950          {
00951             ws.insert(s->m_SocketID);
00952             ++ count;
00953          }
00954       }
00955 
00956       // query exceptions on sockets
00957       for (vector<CUDTSocket*>::iterator j3 = eu.begin(); j3 != eu.end(); ++ j3)
00958       {
00959          // check connection request status, not supported now
00960       }
00961 
00962       if (0 < count)
00963          break;
00964 
00965       CTimer::waitForEvent();
00966    } while (to > CTimer::getTime() - entertime);
00967 
00968    if (NULL != readfds)
00969       *readfds = rs;
00970 
00971    if (NULL != writefds)
00972       *writefds = ws;
00973 
00974    if (NULL != exceptfds)
00975       *exceptfds = es;
00976 
00977    return count;
00978 }
00979 
00980 int CUDTUnited::selectEx(const vector<UDTSOCKET>& fds, vector<UDTSOCKET>* readfds, vector<UDTSOCKET>* writefds, vector<UDTSOCKET>* exceptfds, int64_t msTimeOut)
00981 {
00982    uint64_t entertime = CTimer::getTime();
00983 
00984    uint64_t to;
00985    if (msTimeOut >= 0)
00986       to = msTimeOut * 1000;
00987    else
00988       to = 0xFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFULL;
00989 
00990    // initialize results
00991    int count = 0;
00992    if (NULL != readfds)
00993       readfds->clear();
00994    if (NULL != writefds)
00995       writefds->clear();
00996    if (NULL != exceptfds)
00997       exceptfds->clear();
00998 
00999    do
01000    {
01001       for (vector<UDTSOCKET>::const_iterator i = fds.begin(); i != fds.end(); ++ i)
01002       {
01003          CUDTSocket* s = locate(*i);
01004 
01005          if ((NULL == s) || s->m_pUDT->m_bBroken || (s->m_Status == CLOSED))
01006          {
01007             if (NULL != exceptfds)
01008             {
01009                exceptfds->push_back(*i);
01010                ++ count;
01011             }
01012             continue;
01013          }
01014 
01015          if (NULL != readfds)
01016          {
01017             if ((s->m_pUDT->m_bConnected && (s->m_pUDT->m_pRcvBuffer->getRcvDataSize() > 0) && ((s->m_pUDT->m_iSockType == UDT_STREAM) || (s->m_pUDT->m_pRcvBuffer->getRcvMsgNum() > 0)))
01018                || (s->m_pUDT->m_bListening && (s->m_pQueuedSockets->size() > 0)))
01019             {
01020                readfds->push_back(s->m_SocketID);
01021                ++ count;
01022             }
01023          }
01024 
01025          if (NULL != writefds)
01026          {
01027             if (s->m_pUDT->m_bConnected && (s->m_pUDT->m_pSndBuffer->getCurrBufSize() < s->m_pUDT->m_iSndBufSize))
01028             {
01029                writefds->push_back(s->m_SocketID);
01030                ++ count;
01031             }
01032          }
01033       }
01034 
01035       if (count > 0)
01036          break;
01037 
01038       CTimer::waitForEvent();
01039    } while (to > CTimer::getTime() - entertime);
01040 
01041    return count;
01042 }
01043 
01044 int CUDTUnited::epoll_create()
01045 {
01046    return m_EPoll.create();
01047 }

01049 int CUDTUnited::epoll_add_usock(const int eid, const UDTSOCKET u, const int* events)

01052    if (NULL != s)
01053    {
01054       s->m_pUDT->addEPoll(eid);
01055    }
01056    else
01057    {
01058       throw CUDTException(5, 4);
01059    }
01060 
01061    return m_EPoll.add_usock(eid, u, events);
01062 }

01073    {
01074       s->m_pUDT->removeEPoll(eid);
01075    }

01089 int CUDTUnited::epoll_wait(const int eid, set<UDTSOCKET>* readfds, set<UDTSOCKET>* writefds, int64_t msTimeOut, set<SYSSOCKET>* lrfds, set<SYSSOCKET>* lwfds)

01098 
01099 CUDTSocket* CUDTUnited::locate(const UDTSOCKET u)
01100 {
01101    CGuard cg(m_ControlLock);
01102 
01103    map<UDTSOCKET, CUDTSocket*>::iterator i = m_Sockets.find(u);
01104 
01105    if ((i == m_Sockets.end()) || (i->second->m_Status == CLOSED))
01106       return NULL;
01107 
01108    return i->second;
01109 }
01110 
01111 CUDTSocket* CUDTUnited::locate(const sockaddr* peer, const UDTSOCKET& id, const int32_t& isn)
01112 {
01113    CGuard cg(m_ControlLock);
01114 
01115    map<int64_t, set<UDTSOCKET> >::iterator i = m_PeerRec.find((id << 30) + isn);
01116    if (i == m_PeerRec.end())
01117       return NULL;
01118 
01119    for (set<UDTSOCKET>::iterator j = i->second.begin(); j != i->second.end(); ++ j)
01120    {
01121       map<UDTSOCKET, CUDTSocket*>::iterator k = m_Sockets.find(*j);
01122       // this socket might have been closed and moved m_ClosedSockets
01123       if (k == m_Sockets.end())
01124          continue;
01125 
01126       if (CIPAddress::ipcmp(peer, k->second->m_pPeerAddr, k->second->m_iIPversion))
01127          return k->second;
01128    }
01129 
01130    return NULL;
01131 }
01132 
01133 void CUDTUnited::checkBrokenSockets()
01134 {
01135    CGuard cg(m_ControlLock);
01136 
01137    // set of sockets To Be Closed and To Be Removed
01138    vector<UDTSOCKET> tbc;
01139    vector<UDTSOCKET> tbr;
01140 
01141    for (map<UDTSOCKET, CUDTSocket*>::iterator i = m_Sockets.begin(); i != m_Sockets.end(); ++ i)
01142    {
01143       // check broken connection
01144       if (i->second->m_pUDT->m_bBroken)
01145       {
01146          if (i->second->m_Status == LISTENING)
01147          {
01148             // for a listening socket, it should wait an extra 3 seconds in case a client is connecting
01149             if (CTimer::getTime() - i->second->m_TimeStamp < 3000000)
01150                continue;
01151          }
01152          else if ((i->second->m_pUDT->m_pRcvBuffer->getRcvDataSize() > 0) && (i->second->m_pUDT->m_iBrokenCounter -- > 0))
01153          {
01154             // if there is still data in the receiver buffer, wait longer
01155             continue;
01156          }
01157 
01158          //close broken connections and start removal timer
01159          i->second->m_Status = CLOSED;
01160          i->second->m_TimeStamp = CTimer::getTime();
01161          tbc.push_back(i->first);
01162          m_ClosedSockets[i->first] = i->second;
01163 
01164          // remove from listener's queue
01165          map<UDTSOCKET, CUDTSocket*>::iterator ls = m_Sockets.find(i->second->m_ListenSocket);
01166          if (ls == m_Sockets.end())
01167          {
01168             ls = m_ClosedSockets.find(i->second->m_ListenSocket);
01169             if (ls == m_ClosedSockets.end())
01170                continue;
01171          }
01172 
01173          CGuard::enterCS(ls->second->m_AcceptLock);
01174          ls->second->m_pQueuedSockets->erase(i->second->m_SocketID);
01175          ls->second->m_pAcceptSockets->erase(i->second->m_SocketID);
01176          CGuard::leaveCS(ls->second->m_AcceptLock);
01177       }
01178    }
01179 
01180    for (map<UDTSOCKET, CUDTSocket*>::iterator j = m_ClosedSockets.begin(); j != m_ClosedSockets.end(); ++ j)
01181    {
01182       // timeout 1 second to destroy a socket AND it has been removed from RcvUList AND no linger data to send
01183       if ((CTimer::getTime() - j->second->m_TimeStamp > 1000000) && 
01184           ((NULL == j->second->m_pUDT->m_pRNode) || !j->second->m_pUDT->m_pRNode->m_bOnList) &&
01185           ((NULL == j->second->m_pUDT->m_pSndBuffer) || (0 == j->second->m_pUDT->m_pSndBuffer->getCurrBufSize()) || (j->second->m_pUDT->m_ullLingerExpiration <= CTimer::getTime())))
01186       {
01187          tbr.push_back(j->first);
01188       }
01189    }
01190 
01191    // move closed sockets to the ClosedSockets structure
01192    for (vector<UDTSOCKET>::iterator k = tbc.begin(); k != tbc.end(); ++ k)
01193       m_Sockets.erase(*k);
01194 
01195    // remove those timeout sockets
01196    for (vector<UDTSOCKET>::iterator l = tbr.begin(); l != tbr.end(); ++ l)
01197       removeSocket(*l);
01198 }
01199 
01200 void CUDTUnited::removeSocket(const UDTSOCKET u)
01201 {
01202    map<UDTSOCKET, CUDTSocket*>::iterator i = m_ClosedSockets.find(u);
01203 
01204    // invalid socket ID
01205    if (i == m_ClosedSockets.end())
01206       return;
01207 
01208    // decrease multiplexer reference count, and remove it if necessary
01209    const int mid = i->second->m_iMuxID;
01210 
01211    if (NULL != i->second->m_pQueuedSockets)
01212    {
01213       CGuard::enterCS(i->second->m_AcceptLock);
01214 
01215       // if it is a listener, close all un-accepted sockets in its queue and remove them later
01216       for (set<UDTSOCKET>::iterator q = i->second->m_pQueuedSockets->begin(); q != i->second->m_pQueuedSockets->end(); ++ q)
01217       {
01218          m_Sockets[*q]->m_pUDT->m_bBroken = true;
01219          m_Sockets[*q]->m_pUDT->close();
01220          m_Sockets[*q]->m_TimeStamp = CTimer::getTime();
01221          m_Sockets[*q]->m_Status = CLOSED;
01222          m_ClosedSockets[*q] = m_Sockets[*q];
01223          m_Sockets.erase(*q);
01224       }
01225 
01226       CGuard::leaveCS(i->second->m_AcceptLock);
01227    }
01228 
01229    // remove from peer rec
01230    map<int64_t, set<UDTSOCKET> >::iterator j = m_PeerRec.find((i->second->m_PeerID << 30) + i->second->m_iISN);
01231    if (j != m_PeerRec.end())
01232    {
01233       j->second.erase(u);
01234       if (j->second.empty())
01235          m_PeerRec.erase(j);
01236    }
01237 
01238    // delete this one
01239    i->second->m_pUDT->close();
01240    delete i->second;
01241    m_ClosedSockets.erase(i);
01242 
01243    map<int, CMultiplexer>::iterator m;
01244    m = m_mMultiplexer.find(mid);
01245    if (m == m_mMultiplexer.end())
01246    {
01247       //something is wrong!!!
01248       return;
01249    }
01250 
01251    m->second.m_iRefCount --;
01252    if (0 == m->second.m_iRefCount)
01253    {
01254       m->second.m_pChannel->close();
01255       delete m->second.m_pSndQueue;
01256       delete m->second.m_pRcvQueue;
01257       delete m->second.m_pTimer;
01258       delete m->second.m_pChannel;
01259       m_mMultiplexer.erase(m);
01260    }
01261 }
01262 
01263 void CUDTUnited::setError(CUDTException* e)
01264 {
01265    #ifndef WIN32
01266       delete (CUDTException*)pthread_getspecific(m_TLSError);
01267       pthread_setspecific(m_TLSError, e);
01268    #else
01269       CGuard tg(m_TLSLock);
01270       delete (CUDTException*)TlsGetValue(m_TLSError);
01271       TlsSetValue(m_TLSError, e);
01272       m_mTLSRecord[GetCurrentThreadId()] = e;
01273    #endif
01274 }
01275 
01276 CUDTException* CUDTUnited::getError()
01277 {
01278    #ifndef WIN32
01279       if(NULL == pthread_getspecific(m_TLSError))
01280          pthread_setspecific(m_TLSError, new CUDTException);
01281       return (CUDTException*)pthread_getspecific(m_TLSError);
01282    #else
01283       CGuard tg(m_TLSLock);
01284       if(NULL == TlsGetValue(m_TLSError))
01285       {
01286          CUDTException* e = new CUDTException;
01287          TlsSetValue(m_TLSError, e);
01288          m_mTLSRecord[GetCurrentThreadId()] = e;
01289       }
01290       return (CUDTException*)TlsGetValue(m_TLSError);
01291    #endif
01292 }
01293 
01294 #ifdef WIN32
01295 void CUDTUnited::checkTLSValue()
01296 {
01297    CGuard tg(m_TLSLock);
01298 
01299    vector<DWORD> tbr;
01300    for (map<DWORD, CUDTException*>::iterator i = m_mTLSRecord.begin(); i != m_mTLSRecord.end(); ++ i)
01301    {
01302       HANDLE h = OpenThread(THREAD_QUERY_INFORMATION, FALSE, i->first);
01303       if (NULL == h)
01304       {
01305          tbr.insert(tbr.end(), i->first);
01306          break;
01307       }
01308       if (WAIT_OBJECT_0 == WaitForSingleObject(h, 0))
01309       {
01310          delete i->second;
01311          tbr.insert(tbr.end(), i->first);
01312       }
01313       CloseHandle(h);
01314    }
01315    for (vector<DWORD>::iterator j = tbr.begin(); j != tbr.end(); ++ j)
01316       m_mTLSRecord.erase(*j);
01317 }
01318 #endif
01319 
01320 void CUDTUnited::updateMux(CUDTSocket* s, const sockaddr* addr, const UDPSOCKET* udpsock)
01321 {
01322    CGuard cg(m_ControlLock);
01323 
01324    if ((s->m_pUDT->m_bReuseAddr) && (NULL != addr))
01325    {
01326       int port = (AF_INET == s->m_pUDT->m_iIPversion) ? ntohs(((sockaddr_in*)addr)->sin_port) : ntohs(((sockaddr_in6*)addr)->sin6_port);
01327 
01328       // find a reusable address
01329       for (map<int, CMultiplexer>::iterator i = m_mMultiplexer.begin(); i != m_mMultiplexer.end(); ++ i)
01330       {
01331          if ((i->second.m_iIPversion == s->m_pUDT->m_iIPversion) && (i->second.m_iMSS == s->m_pUDT->m_iMSS) && i->second.m_bReusable)
01332          {
01333             if (i->second.m_iPort == port)
01334             {
01335                // reuse the existing multiplexer
01336                ++ i->second.m_iRefCount;
01337                s->m_pUDT->m_pSndQueue = i->second.m_pSndQueue;
01338                s->m_pUDT->m_pRcvQueue = i->second.m_pRcvQueue;
01339                s->m_iMuxID = i->second.m_iID;
01340                return;
01341             }
01342          }
01343       }
01344    }
01345 
01346    // a new multiplexer is needed
01347    CMultiplexer m;
01348    m.m_iMSS = s->m_pUDT->m_iMSS;
01349    m.m_iIPversion = s->m_pUDT->m_iIPversion;
01350    m.m_iRefCount = 1;
01351    m.m_bReusable = s->m_pUDT->m_bReuseAddr;
01352    m.m_iID = s->m_SocketID;
01353 
01354    m.m_pChannel = new CChannel(s->m_pUDT->m_iIPversion);
01355    m.m_pChannel->setSndBufSize(s->m_pUDT->m_iUDPSndBufSize);
01356    m.m_pChannel->setRcvBufSize(s->m_pUDT->m_iUDPRcvBufSize);
01357 
01358    try
01359    {
01360       if (NULL != udpsock)
01361          m.m_pChannel->open(*udpsock);
01362       else
01363          m.m_pChannel->open(addr);
01364    }
01365    catch (CUDTException& e)
01366    {
01367       m.m_pChannel->close();
01368       delete m.m_pChannel;
01369       throw e;
01370    }
01371 
01372    sockaddr* sa = (AF_INET == s->m_pUDT->m_iIPversion) ? (sockaddr*) new sockaddr_in : (sockaddr*) new sockaddr_in6;
01373    m.m_pChannel->getSockAddr(sa);
01374    m.m_iPort = (AF_INET == s->m_pUDT->m_iIPversion) ? ntohs(((sockaddr_in*)sa)->sin_port) : ntohs(((sockaddr_in6*)sa)->sin6_port);
01375    if (AF_INET == s->m_pUDT->m_iIPversion) delete (sockaddr_in*)sa; else delete (sockaddr_in6*)sa;
01376 
01377    m.m_pTimer = new CTimer;
01378 
01379    m.m_pSndQueue = new CSndQueue;
01380    m.m_pSndQueue->init(m.m_pChannel, m.m_pTimer);
01381    m.m_pRcvQueue = new CRcvQueue;
01382    m.m_pRcvQueue->init(32, s->m_pUDT->m_iPayloadSize, m.m_iIPversion, 1024, m.m_pChannel, m.m_pTimer);
01383 
01384    m_mMultiplexer[m.m_iID] = m;
01385 
01386    s->m_pUDT->m_pSndQueue = m.m_pSndQueue;
01387    s->m_pUDT->m_pRcvQueue = m.m_pRcvQueue;
01388    s->m_iMuxID = m.m_iID;
01389 }
01390 
01391 void CUDTUnited::updateMux(CUDTSocket* s, const CUDTSocket* ls)
01392 {
01393    CGuard cg(m_ControlLock);
01394 
01395    int port = (AF_INET == ls->m_iIPversion) ? ntohs(((sockaddr_in*)ls->m_pSelfAddr)->sin_port) : ntohs(((sockaddr_in6*)ls->m_pSelfAddr)->sin6_port);
01396 
01397    // find the listener's address
01398    for (map<int, CMultiplexer>::iterator i = m_mMultiplexer.begin(); i != m_mMultiplexer.end(); ++ i)
01399    {
01400       if (i->second.m_iPort == port)
01401       {
01402          // reuse the existing multiplexer
01403          ++ i->second.m_iRefCount;
01404          s->m_pUDT->m_pSndQueue = i->second.m_pSndQueue;
01405          s->m_pUDT->m_pRcvQueue = i->second.m_pRcvQueue;
01406          s->m_iMuxID = i->second.m_iID;
01407          return;
01408       }
01409    }
01410 }
01411 
01412 #ifndef WIN32
01413    void* CUDTUnited::garbageCollect(void* p)
01414 #else
01415    DWORD WINAPI CUDTUnited::garbageCollect(LPVOID p)
01416 #endif
01417 {
01418    CUDTUnited* self = (CUDTUnited*)p;
01419 
01420    CGuard gcguard(self->m_GCStopLock);
01421 
01422    while (!self->m_bClosing)
01423    {
01424       self->checkBrokenSockets();
01425 
01426       #ifdef WIN32
01427          self->checkTLSValue();
01428       #endif
01429 
01430       #ifndef WIN32
01431          timeval now;
01432          timespec timeout;
01433          gettimeofday(&now, 0);
01434          timeout.tv_sec = now.tv_sec + 1;
01435          timeout.tv_nsec = now.tv_usec * 1000;
01436 
01437          pthread_cond_timedwait(&self->m_GCStopCond, &self->m_GCStopLock, &timeout);
01438       #else
01439          WaitForSingleObject(self->m_GCStopCond, 1000);
01440       #endif
01441    }
01442 
01443    // remove all sockets and multiplexers
01444    CGuard::enterCS(self->m_ControlLock);
01445    for (map<UDTSOCKET, CUDTSocket*>::iterator i = self->m_Sockets.begin(); i != self->m_Sockets.end(); ++ i)
01446    {
01447       i->second->m_pUDT->m_bBroken = true;
01448       i->second->m_pUDT->close();
01449       i->second->m_Status = CLOSED;
01450       i->second->m_TimeStamp = CTimer::getTime();
01451       self->m_ClosedSockets[i->first] = i->second;
01452 
01453       // remove from listener's queue
01454       map<UDTSOCKET, CUDTSocket*>::iterator ls = self->m_Sockets.find(i->second->m_ListenSocket);
01455       if (ls == self->m_Sockets.end())
01456       {
01457          ls = self->m_ClosedSockets.find(i->second->m_ListenSocket);
01458          if (ls == self->m_ClosedSockets.end())
01459             continue;
01460       }
01461 
01462       CGuard::enterCS(ls->second->m_AcceptLock);
01463       ls->second->m_pQueuedSockets->erase(i->second->m_SocketID);
01464       ls->second->m_pAcceptSockets->erase(i->second->m_SocketID);
01465       CGuard::leaveCS(ls->second->m_AcceptLock);
01466    }
01467    self->m_Sockets.clear();
01468 
01469    for (map<UDTSOCKET, CUDTSocket*>::iterator j = self->m_ClosedSockets.begin(); j != self->m_ClosedSockets.end(); ++ j)
01470    {
01471       j->second->m_TimeStamp = 0;
01472    }
01473    CGuard::leaveCS(self->m_ControlLock);
01474 
01475    while (true)
01476    {
01477       self->checkBrokenSockets();
01478 
01479       CGuard::enterCS(self->m_ControlLock);
01480       bool empty = self->m_ClosedSockets.empty();
01481       CGuard::leaveCS(self->m_ControlLock);
01482 
01483       if (empty)
01484          break;
01485 
01486       CTimer::sleep();
01487    }
01488 
01489    #ifndef WIN32
01490       return NULL;
01491    #else
01492       return 0;
01493    #endif
01494 }
01495

01507 
01508 UDTSOCKET CUDT::socket(int af, int type, int)
01509 {
01510    if (!s_UDTUnited.m_bGCStatus)
01511       s_UDTUnited.startup();
01512 
01513    try
01514    {
01515       return s_UDTUnited.newSocket(af, type);
01516    }
01517    catch (CUDTException& e)
01518    {
01519       s_UDTUnited.setError(new CUDTException(e));
01520       return INVALID_SOCK;
01521    }
01522    catch (bad_alloc&)
01523    {
01524       s_UDTUnited.setError(new CUDTException(3, 2, 0));
01525       return INVALID_SOCK;
01526    }
01527    catch (...)
01528    {
01529       s_UDTUnited.setError(new CUDTException(-1, 0, 0));
01530       return INVALID_SOCK;
01531    }
01532 }

01867 int CUDT::select(int, ud_set* readfds, ud_set* writefds, ud_set* exceptfds, const timeval* timeout)
01868 {
01869    if ((NULL == readfds) && (NULL == writefds) && (NULL == exceptfds))
01870    {
01871       s_UDTUnited.setError(new CUDTException(5, 3, 0));
01872       return ERROR;
01873    }
01874 
01875    try
01876    {
01877       return s_UDTUnited.select(readfds, writefds, exceptfds, timeout);
01878    }
01879    catch (CUDTException e)
01880    {
01881       s_UDTUnited.setError(new CUDTException(e));
01882       return ERROR;
01883    }
01884    catch (bad_alloc&)
01885    {
01886       s_UDTUnited.setError(new CUDTException(3, 2, 0));
01887       return ERROR;
01888    }
01889    catch (...)
01890    {
01891       s_UDTUnited.setError(new CUDTException(-1, 0, 0));
01892       return ERROR;
01893    }
01894 }

01896 int CUDT::selectEx(const vector<UDTSOCKET>& fds, vector<UDTSOCKET>* readfds, vector<UDTSOCKET>* writefds, vector<UDTSOCKET>* exceptfds, int64_t msTimeOut)
01897 {
01898    if ((NULL == readfds) && (NULL == writefds) && (NULL == exceptfds))
01899    {
01900       s_UDTUnited.setError(new CUDTException(5, 3, 0));
01901       return ERROR;
01902    }
01903 
01904    try
01905    {
01906       return s_UDTUnited.selectEx(fds, readfds, writefds, exceptfds, msTimeOut);
01907    }
01908    catch (CUDTException e)
01909    {
01910       s_UDTUnited.setError(new CUDTException(e));
01911       return ERROR;
01912    }
01913    catch (bad_alloc&)
01914    {
01915       s_UDTUnited.setError(new CUDTException(3, 2, 0));
01916       return ERROR;
01917    }
01918    catch (...)
01919    {
01920       s_UDTUnited.setError(new CUDTException(-1, 0, 0));
01921       return ERROR;
01922    }
01923 }

01942 
01943 int CUDT::epoll_add_usock(const int eid, const UDTSOCKET u, const int* events)
01944 {
01945    try
01946    {
01947       return s_UDTUnited.epoll_add_usock(eid, u, events);
01948    }
01949    catch (CUDTException e)
01950    {

02056 int CUDT::perfmon(UDTSOCKET u, CPerfMon* perf, bool clear)
02057 {
02058    try
02059    {
02060       CUDT* udt = s_UDTUnited.lookup(u);
02061       udt->sample(perf, clear);
02062       return 0;
02063    }
02064    catch (CUDTException e)
02065    {
02066       s_UDTUnited.setError(new CUDTException(e));
02067       return ERROR;
02068    }
02069    catch (...)
02070    {
02071       s_UDTUnited.setError(new CUDTException(-1, 0, 0));
02072       return ERROR;
02073    }
